reasoning: Broad category potentially including systemic and cutaneous forms. Estimated incidence ~1.5 per 100k based primarily on systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) data from medical literature; does not include cutaneous-only lupus vulgaris or discoid forms which have separate epidemiology.
source: Danchenko N et al. (2006). Epidemiology of systemic lupus erythematosus: a comparison of worldwide disease and mortality patterns. Lupus. 15(5):308-318
